:** Enhance Leap
:** Disguise Self
:** Find Familiar
:** Longstrider
:** Speak with Animals
:** Speak with Dead

grants.name: Ritual Caster: Free Spells
grants.description:
You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice from the following: 
* Speak with Dead
* Find Familiar
* Longstrider
* Enhance Leap
* Disguise Self
* Speak with Animals

options.name: Savage Attacker
options.description:
Savage Attacker|w=30
:* When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

grants.name: Savage Attacker
grants.description: When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

options.name: Sentinel
options.description:
Sentinel: Vengeance|w=30
:* When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

Sentinel: Snare|w=30
:* When you hit a creature with an Attack of Opportunity, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

grants.name: Sentinel: Vengeance
grants.description: When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

grants.name: Sentinel: Snare
grants.description: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

grants.name: Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage
grants.description: You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

options.name: Sharpshooter
options.description:
Sharpshooter: Low Ground|w=30
:* Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

Sharpshooter: All In|w=30
:* Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: Low Ground
grants.description: Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: All In
grants.description:
Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
(This is a toggleable passive effect)

options.name: Shield Master
options.description:
Shield Master|w=30
:* Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

Shield Master: Block|w=30
:* If a Spell forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
:* Notes:
:** On a failed save, you only take half damage.
:** On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

grants.name: Shield Master
grants.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

grants.name: Shield Master: Block
grants.description:
If a Spell forces you to make a DEX, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
* On a failed save, you only take half damage.
* On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

options.name: Skilled
options.description:
Skilled|w=30
:* You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

grants.name: Skilled
grants.description: You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

options.name: Spell Sniper
options.description:
Spell Sniper|w=30
:* You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.
:* Notes:
:** The cantrip you learn must be one of these:
:*** Bone Chill
:*** Eldritch Blast
:*** Fire Bolt
:*** Ray of Frost
:*** Shocking Grasp
:*** Thorn Whip
:** These cantrips do scale with character level, just like a spellcaster's cantrips.

grants.name: Spell Sniper
grants.description:
You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

The cantrip must be one of:
* Bone Chill
* Eldritch Blast
* Fire Bolt
* Ray of Frost
* Shocking Grasp
* Thorn Whip

options.name: Tavern Brawler
options.description:
Tavern Brawler|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your strength modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

grants.name: Tavern Brawler
grants.description:
Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.

When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

options.name: Tough
options.description:
Tough|w=30
:* Hit Point maximum increased by 2 for each level.

grants.name: Tough
grants.description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained.

options.name: War Caster
options.description:
War Caster: Concentration|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

War Caster: Opportunity Spell|w=30
:* You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.
:* Note: this feat does not grant the cantrip Shocking Grasp. Unless you know it from another source, you can only  cast it as an Attack of Opportunity.

grants.name: War Caster: Concentration
grants.description: You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

grants.name: War Caster: Opportunity Spell
grants.description: You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.

options.name: Weapon Master
options.description:
Weapon Master|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with four Weapon types of your choice.
|}

options.name: Draconic Bloodline
options.description: Your veins carry draconic magic, the result of a powerful dragon ancestor.
options.image: Class Sorcerer Draconic Bloodline Badge Icon.png

grants.name: Elemental Affinity: Damage
grants.description: When you cast a spell that deals damage of the type associated with your draconic ancestry, you add your Modifier to the damage

grants.name: Elemental Affinity: Resistance
grants.description: When you cast a spell that deals damage matching your draconic ancestry, you can spend a sp|1 to gain Resistance to that damage type.

options.name: Storm Sorcery
options.description: Whether crackling with the energy of ancient deluges or pierced by gales and hurricanes, your lineage is a strange tapestry scrawled by a tempest.

grants.name: Heart of the Storm
grants.description: When you cast a Spell of Level 1 or higher that deals Lightning or Thunder damage, you cause a small, local storm. All enemies within m=6|ft=20 take  (Sorcerer Level / 2) | Lightning or  (Sorcerer Level / 2) | Thunder.

grants.name: Heart of the Storm: Lightning
grants.description: When you cast a Spell of Level 1 or higher that deals Lightning damage, you cause a small, local storm. All enemies within m=6|ft=20 take (Sorcerer Level / 2)|Lightning damage.

grants.name: Heart of the Storm: Thunder
grants.description: When you cast a Spell of Level 1 or higher that deals Thunder damage, you cause a small, local storm. All enemies within m=6|ft=20 take (Sorcerer Level / 2)|Thunder damage.

grants.name: Heart of the Storm: Resistance
grants.description: You are Resistant to Lightning and Thunder damage

grants.name: Thunderwave
grants.description: Release a wave of thunderous force that pushes away all creatures and objects in an area, while also dealing Thunder damage.

grants.name: Create or Destroy Water
grants.description: Choose to call forth rain or destroy a water-based surface.

grants.name: Gust of Wind
grants.description: Summon a strong wind that clears all clouds. Any creatures caught in the gale who fail a Strength SavingThrow will be pushed back ft=17 and be thrown Off Balance.

grants.name: Sleet Storm
grants.description:
Call forth a storm that douses fire, creates an Ice Surface, and forces spellcasters to succeed at a Concentration SavingThrow in order to maintain Concentration.

Ice is a surface that is considered Prone}} on a failed [[Dexterity SavingThrow.

grants.name: Call Lightning
grants.description: Call down lightning to hit all targets within range and its area of effect for 3d10|Lightning damage.

options.name: Wild Magic
options.description: Your powers come from ancient forces of chaos. They churn within you -- waiting to burst free at any time.
options.image: Class Sorcerer Wild Magic Badge Icon.png

grants.name: Bend Luck
grants.description: Give a target a {{DieIcon|d4|Physical1d4}} bonus or penalty to an Attack Roll, D20|25 Ability Check, or SavingThrow.

options.name: Ability Improvement

Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

grants.name: Ability Improvement

* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

options.name: Actor
options.description:
* Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

Alert|w=30
:* You gain a +5 bonus to Surprised.

grants.name: Alert

options.name: Athlete

Athlete: Standing Up|w=30

options.name: Charger
options.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

Charger: Shove|w=30

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30

options.name: Defensive Duellist

Defensive Duellist|w=30
:* When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

grants.name: Defensive Duellist
grants.description: When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

options.name: Dual Wielder
options.description:
Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class|w=30
:* You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

Dual Wielder|w=30
:* You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if your weapons aren't Light You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

grants.name: Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class
grants.description: You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

grants.name: Dual Wielder
grants.description: You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if the weapons you are wielding aren't Light. You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

options.name: Dungeon Delver
options.description:
Dungeon Delver: Perception|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Perception checks made to detect hidden objects and on SavingThrows made to avoid or resist traps.

Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps|w=30
:* You gain Resistance to the damage dealt by traps.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Perception
grants.description: You have Advantage on Perception Checks made to detect hidden objects.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps
grants.description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws made to avoid traps and Resistance to trap damage.

options.name: Durable

Durable|w=30
:* Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

grants.name: Durable
grants.description: Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:
* Elemental Adept: Acid
* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Acid
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Acid damage. In addition, when you deal Acid damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Cold
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Cold damage. In addition, when you deal Cold damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Lightning
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Fire
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Fire damage. In addition, when you deal Fire damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Thunder
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

options.name: Great Weapon Master
options.description:
Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When an attack with a melee weapon lands a Critical Hit or kills a creature, you can make another melee weapon attack as a Bonus Action that turn.

Great Weapon Master: All In|w=30
:* When attacking with a Two-Handed or Versatile melee weapon (in both hands) that you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description: When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus that turn.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: All In
grants.description: When attacking with Heavy melee weapons you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

options.name: Heavily Armoured

Heavily Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with HeavyArmour.

grants.name: Heavily Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Medium Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Heavy Armour Master

Heavy Armour Master|w=30

options.name: Charger
options.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:
* Elemental Adept: Acid
* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Acid

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Cold

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Lightning
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Fire

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Thunder
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: All In

name: Warlock
description: Warlock is a character Class in Baldur's Gate 3. Warlocks channel their patron's pact magic to fight enemies and aid allies in combat. Warlocks use Charisma as their primary ability score.

options.name: The Archfey
options.description: Graced by a lady or lord of the fey, you are imbued with all the sumptuous and scary qualities of your patron's extraordinary realm.

grants.name: Fey Presence
grants.description: Charmed|Charm or Frightened|Frighten nearby foes with the feywild's beguiling, disturbing magics.

grants.name: Faerie Fire
grants.description: All targets within the light turn visible, and Attack Rolls against them have Advantage.

grants.name: Sleep
grants.description:
Put creatures into a magical slumber. Select targets up to a combined 24 Hit Points.

The condition ends upon taking damage.

options.name: The Fiend
options.description: Warlocks in service to fiends work toward corrupting, destructive ends -- intentionally or otherwise -- and receive hellish blessings in turn.

grants.name: Dark One's Blessing
grants.description: Whenever you reduce a hostile creature to 0 Charisma Modifier + [[Warlock Level}} temporary hit points.

grants.name: Burning Hands
grants.description:
Each flammable target is hit with 3d6|Fire Fire|damage.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.

grants.name: Command
grants.description: Command a creature to flee, move closer, freeze, drop to the ground or drop its weapon. The target must succeed on a Wisdom in order to resist the effects.

options.name: The Great Old One
options.description: Warlocks bound to eldritch beings in the Far Realms work toward inscrutable goals, gaining strange powers over entropy and the mind.
options.image: Class Warlock Great Old One Badge Icon.png

grants.name: Mortal Reminder
grants.description: When you land a Critical Hit against a creature, that creature and any nearby enemies must succeed a Wisdom Saving Throw or become Frightened until the end of their next turn.

grants.name: Dissonant Whispers
grants.description:
Frightened|Frighten a creature: it will be easier to hit and cannot move.

On a successful Wisdom, the creature only takes half damage.

grants.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
grants.description:
Leave a creature Prone with laughter, without the ability to get up.

The creature must have an Intelligence of 5 or more.
The target can try to shake off the effect each time it takes damage.

grants.name: Pact Boon
grants.description:
Your otherworldly patron bestows a gift upon you for your loyal service. You gain one of the following features of your choice:

==== Pact of the Chain|w=40====

Gain the service of a familiar, a fey spirit that takes a form you choose. This can be an animal, imp, or quasit.
* Find Familiar|w=40
* Find Familiar: Imp|w=40
* Find Familiar: Quasit|w=40

==== Pact of the Blade (Passive Feature)|Pact of the Blade|w=40 ====
You can Summon a pact weapon, or Bind the one you are wielding, making it magical.
Pact weapons use the wielder's Spellcasting Ability Modifier instead of Strength or Dexterity.

* Pact of the Blade|w=40
* Bind Pact Weapon|w=40

==== Pact of the Tome|w=40 ====
Your patron grants you a grimoire called 'The Book of Shadows', which allows you to cast several spells.

* Guidance|w=40
* Vicious Mockery|w=40
* Thorn Whip|w=40.

options.name: Ability Improvement
options.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

grants.name: Ability Improvement
grants.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

options.name: Actor
options.description:
* Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

options.name: Alert
options.description:
Alert|w=30
:* You gain a +5 bonus to Surprised.

grants.name: Alert
grants.description: You gain +5 to Initiative and can no longer be surprised.

options.name: Athlete
options.description:
Athlete: Standing Up|w=30
:* Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump distance also increases by 50%.

grants.name: Athlete: Standing Up
grants.description: When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump distance also increases by 50%.

options.name: Charger
options.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

options.name: Crossbow Expert
options.description:
Crossbow Expert: Point-Blank|w=30
:* When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30 
:* Your Piercing Shot also inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

grants.description:

:* When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30

options.name: Defensive Duellist
options.description:
Defensive Duellist|w=30
:* When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

grants.name: Defensive Duellist
grants.description: When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

options.name: Dual Wielder
options.description:
Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class|w=30
:* You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

Dual Wielder|w=30
:* You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if your weapons aren't Light You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

grants.name: Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class
grants.description: You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

grants.name: Dual Wielder
grants.description: You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if the weapons you are wielding aren't Light. You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

options.name: Dungeon Delver
options.description:
Dungeon Delver: Perception|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Perception checks made to detect hidden objects and on SavingThrows made to avoid or resist traps.

Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps|w=30
:* You gain Resistance to the damage dealt by traps.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Perception
grants.description: You have Advantage on Perception Checks made to detect hidden objects.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps
grants.description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws made to avoid traps and Resistance to trap damage.

options.name: Durable
options.description:
Durable|w=30
:* Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

grants.name: Durable
grants.description: Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:
* Elemental Adept: Acid
* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Acid
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Acid damage. In addition, when you deal Acid damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Cold
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Cold damage. In addition, when you deal Cold damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Lightning
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Fire
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Fire damage. In addition, when you deal Fire damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Thunder
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

options.name: Great Weapon Master
options.description:
Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When an attack with a melee weapon lands a Critical Hit or kills a creature, you can make another melee weapon attack as a Bonus Action that turn.

Great Weapon Master: All In|w=30
:* When attacking with a Two-Handed or Versatile melee weapon (in both hands) that you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description: When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus that turn.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: All In
grants.description: When attacking with Heavy melee weapons you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

options.name: Heavily Armoured
options.description:
Heavily Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with HeavyArmour.

grants.name: Heavily Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Medium Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Heavy Armour Master
options.description:
Heavy Armour Master|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

grants.name: Heavy Armour Master
grants.description:
Your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

Requires Proficiency with Heavy Armour

options.name: Lightly Armoured
options.description:
Lightly Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with LightArmour.

grants.name: Lightly Armoured
grants.description: You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength and Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Bard|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

Magic Initiate: Cleric|w=30

options.name: Martial Adept
options.description:
Martial Adept|w=30
:* Learn two manoeuvres from the Short or Long Rest.

grants.name: Martial Adept
grants.description: Learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master archetype and receive 1 (additional) supdie to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.

options.name: Medium Armour Master
options.description:
Medium Armour Master|w=30
:* When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

grants.name: Medium Armour Master
grants.description:
When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to ArmourClass you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

You must have Proficiency in Medium Armor to take this feat

options.name: Mobile
options.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

grants.name: Mobile
grants.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

options.name: Moderately Armoured
options.description:
Moderately Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with MediumArmour and Shields.

grants.name: Moderately Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Medium Armour and Shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Light Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Performer
options.description:
* Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

grants.name: Performer
grants.description:
* Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

options.name: Polearm Master
options.description:
Polearm Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
:* Note: This attack deals 1d4 + Weapon Ability Modifier damage.

Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

grants.name: Polearm Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description:
When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
This attack does 1d4|Bludgeoning|modifier=melee

grants.name: Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack
grants.description: You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

options.name: Resilient
options.description:
Resilient|w=30
:* You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrows.
:* Note: this increase does apply to a druid in wild shape.

grants.name: Resilient
grants.description:
You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrow.

options.name: Ritual Caster
options.description:
Ritual Caster: Free Spells|w=30
:* You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice.
:* Note: the spell must be one of these:
:** Enhance Leap
:** Disguise Self
:** Find Familiar
:** Longstrider
:** Speak with Animals
:** Speak with Dead

grants.name: Ritual Caster: Free Spells
grants.description:
You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice from the following: 
* Speak with Dead
* Find Familiar
* Longstrider
* Enhance Leap
* Disguise Self
* Speak with Animals

options.name: Savage Attacker
options.description:
Savage Attacker|w=30
:* When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

grants.name: Savage Attacker
grants.description: When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

options.name: Sentinel
options.description:
Sentinel: Vengeance|w=30
:* When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

Sentinel: Snare|w=30
:* When you hit a creature with an Attack of Opportunity, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

grants.name: Sentinel: Vengeance
grants.description: When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

grants.name: Sentinel: Snare
grants.description: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

grants.name: Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage
grants.description: You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

options.name: Sharpshooter
options.description:
Sharpshooter: Low Ground|w=30
:* Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

Sharpshooter: All In|w=30
:* Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: Low Ground
grants.description: Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: All In
grants.description:
Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
(This is a toggleable passive effect)

options.name: Shield Master
options.description:
Shield Master|w=30
:* Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

Shield Master: Block|w=30
:* If a Spell forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
:* Notes:
:** On a failed save, you only take half damage.
:** On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

grants.name: Shield Master
grants.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

grants.name: Shield Master: Block
grants.description:
If a Spell forces you to make a DEX, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
* On a failed save, you only take half damage.
* On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

options.name: Skilled
options.description:
Skilled|w=30
:* You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

grants.name: Skilled
grants.description: You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

options.name: Spell Sniper
options.description:
Spell Sniper|w=30
:* You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.
:* Notes:
:** The cantrip you learn must be one of these:
:*** Bone Chill
:*** Eldritch Blast
:*** Fire Bolt
:*** Ray of Frost
:*** Shocking Grasp
:*** Thorn Whip
:** These cantrips do scale with character level, just like a spellcaster's cantrips.

grants.name: Spell Sniper
grants.description:
You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

The cantrip must be one of:
* Bone Chill
* Eldritch Blast
* Fire Bolt
* Ray of Frost
* Shocking Grasp
* Thorn Whip

Tavern Brawler|w=30

When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

Tough|w=30
:* Hit Point maximum increased by 2 for each level.

grants.name: Tough
grants.description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained.

options.name: War Caster
options.description:
War Caster: Concentration|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

War Caster: Opportunity Spell|w=30
:* You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.
:* Note: this feat does not grant the cantrip Shocking Grasp. Unless you know it from another source, you can only  cast it as an Attack of Opportunity.

grants.name: War Caster: Concentration

grants.name: War Caster: Opportunity Spell
grants.description: You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.

Pleased with your service, your otherworldly patron added new boons to the terms of your pact.

* Pact of the Chain: Your familiar gains an Extra Attack.
* Pact of the Tome: You can cast Animate Dead, Haste, and Call Lightning once per Long Rest.

options.description: Graced by a lady or lord of the fey, you are imbued with all the sumptuous and scary qualities of your patron's extraordinary realm.

grants.name: Misty Step
grants.description: Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.

:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

options.name: Crossbow Expert
options.description:
Crossbow Expert: Point-Blank|w=30
:* When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30 
:* Your Piercing Shot also inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

grants.name: Crossbow Expert
grants.description:
Crossbow Expert: Point-Blank|w=30
:* When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage.

Crossbow Expert: Wounding|w=30 
:* Your Piercing Shot also inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

options.name: Defensive Duellist
options.description:
Defensive Duellist|w=30
:* When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

grants.name: Defensive Duellist
grants.description: When you are attacked with a melee attack while wielding a Finesse Weapon you are Proficient in, you can use a Reaction to increase your ArmourClass by your Proficiency Bonus, possibly causing the attack to miss.

options.name: Dual Wielder
options.description:
Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class|w=30
:* You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

Dual Wielder|w=30
:* You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if your weapons aren't Light You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

grants.name: Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class
grants.description: You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

grants.name: Dual Wielder
grants.description: You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if the weapons you are wielding aren't Light. You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

options.name: Dungeon Delver
options.description:
Dungeon Delver: Perception|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Perception checks made to detect hidden objects and on SavingThrows made to avoid or resist traps.

Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps|w=30
:* You gain Resistance to the damage dealt by traps.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Perception
grants.description: You have Advantage on Perception Checks made to detect hidden objects.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps
grants.description: You have Advantage on Saving Throws made to avoid traps and Resistance to trap damage.

options.name: Durable
options.description:
Durable|w=30
:* Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

grants.name: Durable
grants.description: Regain full Hit Points every time you take a Short Rest.

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:
* Elemental Adept: Acid
* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Acid
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Acid damage. In addition, when you deal Acid damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Cold
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Cold damage. In addition, when you deal Cold damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Lightning
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Fire
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Fire damage. In addition, when you deal Fire damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Thunder
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

options.name: Great Weapon Master
options.description:
Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When an attack with a melee weapon lands a Critical Hit or kills a creature, you can make another melee weapon attack as a Bonus Action that turn.

Great Weapon Master: All In|w=30
:* When attacking with a Two-Handed or Versatile melee weapon (in both hands) that you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description: When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus that turn.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: All In
grants.description: When attacking with Heavy melee weapons you are Proficient with, Attack Rolls take a -5 penalty, but their damage increases by 10.

options.name: Heavily Armoured
options.description:
Heavily Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with HeavyArmour.

grants.name: Heavily Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Medium Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Heavy Armour Master
options.description:
Heavy Armour Master|w=30
:* Increase your Strength by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

grants.name: Heavy Armour Master
grants.description:
Your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Incoming damage from non-magical attacks also decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

Requires Proficiency with Heavy Armour

options.name: Lightly Armoured
options.description:
Lightly Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with LightArmour.

grants.name: Lightly Armoured
grants.description: You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength and Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Bard|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Bard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Cleric|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Wisdom.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Wisdom.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Druid
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Druid|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Druid spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Wisdom.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Druid
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Druid spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Wisdom.

options.description:
Magic Initiate: Sorcerer|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Sorcerer spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Sorcerer spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Warlock|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Warlock spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Charisma.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Warlock spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Charisma.

options.name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
options.description:
Magic Initiate: Wizard|w=30
:* Learn 2 Cantrips and a 1st-level Spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level Spell once per Spellcasting Ability for all three spells is Intelligence.

grants.name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
grants.description: You learn 2 cantrips and a Level 1 spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Your Spellcasting Modifier for all 3 spells is Intelligence.

options.name: Martial Adept
options.description:
Martial Adept|w=30
:* Learn two manoeuvres from the Short or Long Rest.

grants.name: Martial Adept
grants.description: Learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master archetype and receive 1 (additional) supdie to fuel them. You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.

options.name: Medium Armour Master
options.description:
Medium Armour Master|w=30
:* When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

grants.name: Medium Armour Master
grants.description:
When you wear medium armour, it doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth checks. The bonus to ArmourClass you can gain from your Dexterity modifier also becomes +3 instead of +2.

You must have Proficiency in Medium Armor to take this feat

options.name: Mobile
options.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

grants.name: Mobile
grants.description:
* Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10.

Mobile: Evade Difficult Terrain|w=30
:* When you use the Dash action, Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down.

Mobile: Evade Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke an Opportunity Attack from that target.

options.name: Moderately Armoured
options.description:
Moderately Armoured|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with MediumArmour and Shields.

grants.name: Moderately Armoured
grants.description:
You gain Proficiency with Medium Armour and Shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Light Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Performer
options.description:
* Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

grants.name: Performer
grants.description:
* Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.
* Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency.

options.name: Polearm Master
options.description:
Polearm Master: Bonus Attack|w=30
:* When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
:* Note: This attack deals 1d4 + Weapon Ability Modifier damage.

Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack|w=30
:* You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

grants.name: Polearm Master: Bonus Attack
grants.description:
When attacking with a Glaive, Halberd, Quarterstaff, or Spear, you can use a Bonus Action to attack with the butt of your weapon. 
This attack does 1d4|Bludgeoning|modifier=melee

grants.name: Polearm Master: Opportunity Attack
grants.description: You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.

options.name: Resilient
options.description:
Resilient|w=30
:* You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrows.
:* Note: this increase does apply to a druid in wild shape.

grants.name: Resilient
grants.description:
You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Gain Proficiency in that ability's SavingThrow.

options.name: Ritual Caster
options.description:
Ritual Caster: Free Spells|w=30
:* You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice.
:* Note: the spell must be one of these:
:** Enhance Leap
:** Disguise Self
:** Find Familiar
:** Longstrider
:** Speak with Animals
:** Speak with Dead

grants.name: Ritual Caster: Free Spells
grants.description:
You learn two Ritual_Spell_Icon|24px Ritual Spells of your choice from the following: 
* Speak with Dead
* Find Familiar
* Longstrider
* Enhance Leap
* Disguise Self
* Speak with Animals

options.name: Savage Attacker
options.description:
Savage Attacker|w=30
:* When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

grants.name: Savage Attacker
grants.description: When making melee weapon attacks, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result.

options.name: Sentinel
options.description:
Sentinel: Vengeance|w=30
:* When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

Sentinel: Snare|w=30
:* When you hit a creature with an Attack of Opportunity, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

grants.name: Sentinel: Vengeance
grants.description: When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

grants.name: Sentinel: Snare
grants.description: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

grants.name: Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage
grants.description: You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

options.name: Sharpshooter
options.description:
Sharpshooter: Low Ground|w=30
:* Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

Sharpshooter: All In|w=30
:* Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: Low Ground
grants.description: Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: All In
grants.description:
Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage.
(This is a toggleable passive effect)

options.name: Shield Master
options.description:
Shield Master|w=30
:* Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

Shield Master: Block|w=30
:* If a Spell forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
:* Notes:
:** On a failed save, you only take half damage.
:** On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

grants.name: Shield Master
grants.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

grants.name: Shield Master: Block
grants.description:
If a Spell forces you to make a DEX, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
* On a failed save, you only take half damage.
* On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

options.name: Skilled
options.description:
Skilled|w=30
:* You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

grants.name: Skilled
grants.description: You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

options.name: Spell Sniper
options.description:
Spell Sniper|w=30
:* You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.
:* Notes:
:** The cantrip you learn must be one of these:
:*** Bone Chill
:*** Eldritch Blast
:*** Fire Bolt
:*** Ray of Frost
:*** Shocking Grasp
:*** Thorn Whip
:** These cantrips do scale with character level, just like a spellcaster's cantrips.

grants.name: Spell Sniper
grants.description:
You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

The cantrip must be one of:
* Bone Chill
* Eldritch Blast
* Fire Bolt
* Ray of Frost
* Shocking Grasp
* Thorn Whip

options.name: Tavern Brawler
options.description:
Tavern Brawler|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your strength modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

grants.name: Tavern Brawler
grants.description:
Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.

When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

options.name: Tough
options.description:
Tough|w=30
:* Hit Point maximum increased by 2 for each level.

grants.name: Tough
grants.description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained.

options.name: War Caster
options.description:
War Caster: Concentration|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

War Caster: Opportunity Spell|w=30
:* You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.
:* Note: this feat does not grant the cantrip Shocking Grasp. Unless you know it from another source, you can only  cast it as an Attack of Opportunity.

grants.name: War Caster: Concentration
grants.description: You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

grants.name: War Caster: Opportunity Spell
grants.description: You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.

options.name: Weapon Master
options.description:
Weapon Master|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
:* Gain Proficiency with four Weapon types of your choice.

options.name: The Archfey
options.description: Graced by a lady or lord of the fey, you are imbued with all the sumptuous and scary qualities of your patron's extraordinary realm.

grants.name: Beguiling Defences
grants.description: You have built stoic barriers in your heart and mind, and cannot be Charmed.

options.name: The Fiend
options.description: Warlocks in service to fiends work toward corrupting, destructive ends -- intentionally or otherwise -- and receive hellish blessings in turn.

grants.name: Fiendish Resilience
grants.description: Choose a damage type and become Resistant to it. You can pick a new damage type each Short Rest. You can only have 1 type of Resistance at a time.

options.name: The Great Old One
options.description: Warlocks bound to eldritch beings in the Far Realms work toward inscrutable goals, gaining strange powers over entropy and the mind.
options.image: Class Warlock Great Old One Badge Icon.png

grants.name: Thought Shield: Psychic Resistance
grants.description: An elder being shields your brain. You gain Resistance to Psychic damage.

grants.name: Thought Shield: Psychic Reflection
grants.description: Your patron doesn't appreciate attempts to attack your mind. When you take Psychic damage, your attacker takes the same damage.

* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

name: Wizard
description: Wizard is a character Class in Baldur's Gate 3. Wizards channel magic through their extensive knowledge of the arcane to fight enemies and aid allies in combat. Wizards use Intelligence as their primary ability score.

grants.name: Arcane Recovery
grants.description: Once per day out of combat, you can replenish expended Spell Slots.

options.name: Abjuration School
options.description: Abjuration spells summon wards, banish enemies, and nullify magic, suitable for those who wish to defend themselves and others.

grants.name: Arcane Ward
grants.description:
The residual magic of your spells forms a ward around you that protects you from harm.

Each time you cast an Abjuration spell, the intensity of the ward increases by the amount of the spell's Level, up to a maximum of 2x your Wizard level.

Each time you take damage, the ward blocks an amount of damage equal to its intensity, and its intensity decreases by 1.

After each Long Rest, the ward's intensity resets, and becomes the same as your Wizard level.

options.name: Conjuration School
options.description: Compelled by shape and motion, your favoured arcane style involves summoning creatures and objects, as well as displacing them in space.

grants.name: Minor Conjuration: Create Water
grants.description: Call forth rain. It extinguishes exposed flames and forms a Water Surface.

grants.name: Create Water
grants.description: Call forth rain. It extinguishes exposed flames and forms a Water Surface.

options.name: Divination School
options.description: You peer through time itself and can sculpt the future, like temporal clay, into a more favourable form.

grants.name: Portent
grants.description:
Your dreams grant you glimpses that let you influence the future.

After each Long Rest, you gain two random Portent Dice. During the day, you can use your reaction to change the die of any Attack Roll or Saving Throw rolled near you to one of your Portent Dice.

Each Portent Die can only be used once, and you lose your unused Portent Dice at the end of the day.

options.name: Enchantment School
options.description: Your magic influences, beguiles, and bends the will and conviction of those around you.

grants.name: Hypnotic Gaze
grants.description:
Charmed|Charm and Incapacitated|Incapacitates a creature. It cannot attack you. It cannot act.

You can Maintain Hypnotic Gaze your Hypnotic Gaze each turn to extend its duration.

options.name: Evocation School
options.description: Evocation spells focus elemental energy into powerful attacks and enchantments. Those who specialise in this school are known as evokers.

grants.name: Sculpt Spells
grants.description: Create pockets of safety within your Evocation spells. Allies automatically succeed their SavingThrows against these spells and take no damage from them.

options.name: Illusion School
options.description: You specialise in unravelling and restitching the fabric of reality to fool the unwary, the gullible, and the monstrous.

grants.name: Improved Minor Illusion
grants.description:
You can cast Minor Illusion as a bonus action. 

You can remain hidden while casting this spell.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced

grants.name: Minor Illusion
grants.description:
Create an illusion that compels nearby creatures to investigate.

You can remain hidden while casting this spell.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced.

Duration: 10 turns.

options.name: Necromancy School
options.description: You walk through the valley of the shadow of death, and make lots of friends there.

grants.name: Grim Harvest
grants.description: Once per turn, if you kill a creature with a spell, you regain Spell Slot level used - thrice if it's a Necromancy spell. Undead and Constructs are unaffected.

options.name: Transmutation School
options.description: Your innate fascination with the structure of things has granted you an incredible power over crude matter and its manipulation.

grants.name: Experimental Alchemy
grants.description: You brew two Alchemical Solutions instead of one when combining extracts, if you succeed a Check.

options.name: Ability Improvement
options.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

grants.name: Ability Improvement

Shield Master|w=30

grants.name: Shield Master

grants.name: Shield Master: Block
grants.description:
If a Spell forces you to make a DEX, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
* On a failed save, you only take half damage.
* On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

* Bone Chill

* Thorn Whip

options.name: Abjuration School
options.description: Abjuration spells summon wards, banish enemies, and nullify magic, suitable for those who wish to defend themselves and others.

grants.name: Projected Ward
grants.description: When a nearby ally takes damage and you have an active Arcane Ward, you can sacrifice your ward to reduce the damage they take.

options.name: Conjuration School
options.description: Compelled by shape and motion, your favoured arcane style involves summoning creatures and objects, as well as displacing them in space.

grants.name: Benign Transposition: Teleport
grants.description:
Teleport to a nearby, unoccupied space, or swap places with an ally.

Targets must be Medium or Small

options.name: Divination School
options.description: You peer through time itself and can sculpt the future, like temporal clay, into a more favourable form.

grants.name: Expert Divination
grants.description: You may gain an additional Portent Die: when taking a Short Rest you receive a Prophecy. Complete it to regain a missing Portent Die.

options.name: Enchantment School
options.description: Your magic influences, beguiles, and bends the will and conviction of those around you.

grants.name: Instinctive Charm
grants.description: Charmed (Condition)|Charm an enemy attacking you. They will attack a new target if possible as a reaction.

options.name: Evocation School
options.description: Evocation spells focus elemental energy into powerful attacks and enchantments. Those who specialise in this school are known as evokers.

grants.name: Potent Cantrip
grants.description:
Your cantrips become harder to evade entirely.

When a creature succeeds its SavingThrow against one of your cantrips, it still takes half the cantrip's damage, but suffers no additional effects.

options.name: Illusion School
options.description: You specialise in unravelling and restitching the fabric of reality to fool the unwary, the gullible, and the monstrous.

grants.name: See Invisibility (Class Action)
grants.description: Glimpse Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.

grants.name: See Invisibility (Class Action)
grants.description: Glimpse Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.

options.name: Necromancy School
options.description: You walk through the valley of the shadow of death, and make lots of friends there.

grants.name: Undead Thralls: Animate Dead
grants.description: You gain the Animate Dead spell, if you didn't have it already

grants.name: Animate Dead
grants.description:
Animate a corpse to create an undead servant while not in combat.

The target must be a Medium or Small corpse.

grants.name: Undead Thralls: Additional Undead
grants.description: When you use Animate Dead, you can raise an additional corpse.

grants.name: Undead Thralls: Better Summons
grants.description: Creatures created with Animate Dead have additional hit points equal to your wizard level, and your Proficiency Bonus is added to their damage.

options.name: Transmutation School
options.description: Your innate fascination with the structure of things has granted you an incredible power over crude matter and its manipulation.

grants.name: Transmuter's Stone
grants.description:
Store some of your transmutation magic in a small stone. A creature carrying the stone gains a benefit of your choice.

Once you have created a stone, you need to cast a Transmutation spell of Level 1 or higher or take a Long Rest before you can create another one.

grants.name: Transmuter's Stone: Constitution
grants.description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Proficiency in Constitution Saving Throws.

grants.name: Transmuter's Stone: Darkvision
grants.description: Create a stone that lets the carrier see in the dark out to a range of m=18|ft=60.

grants.name: Transmuter's Stone: Speed
grants.description: Create a stone that increases the carrier's movement speed by m=3|ft=10.

grants.name: Transmuter's Stone: Acid Resistance
grants.description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Acid damage.

grants.name: Transmuter's Stone: Cold Resistance
grants.description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Cold damage.

grants.name: Transmuter's Stone: Fire Resistance
grants.description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Fire damage.

grants.name: Transmuter's Stone: Lightning Resistance
grants.description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Lightning damage.

grants.name: Transmuter's Stone: Thunder Resistance
grants.description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Thunder damage.

* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

You gain Proficiency with Medium Armour and Shields, and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

You must have Light Armor Proficiency before you can take this feat.

options.name: Sentinel
options.description:
Sentinel: Vengeance|w=30
:* When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

Sentinel: Snare|w=30
:* When you hit a creature with an Attack of Opportunity, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks.

grants.name: Sentinel: Vengeance
grants.description: When an enemy in melee range attacks an ally, you can use a Reaction to make a weapon attack against that enemy. Target ally must not have the Sentinel feat.

grants.name: Sentinel: Snare
grants.description: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, it can no longer move for the rest of its turn.

grants.name: Sentinel: Opportunity Advantage

options.name: Sharpshooter

Sharpshooter: Low Ground|w=30
:* Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

Sharpshooter: All In|w=30

grants.name: Sharpshooter: Low Ground
grants.description: Your ranged weapon attacks are not penalized for High Ground Rules.

grants.name: Sharpshooter: All In

options.name: Shield Master
options.description:
Shield Master|w=30
:* Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

Shield Master: Block|w=30
:* If a Spell forces you to make a Dexterity Saving Throw, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
:* Notes:
:** On a failed save, you only take half damage.
:** On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

grants.name: Shield Master
grants.description: Gain a +2 bonus to Dexterity SavingThrows when wielding a Shield.

grants.name: Shield Master: Block
grants.description:
If a Spell forces you to make a DEX, you can use your Reaction to shield yourself and diminish the effect's damage.
* On a failed save, you only take half damage.
* On a successful save, you don't take any damage, even if you normally would.

options.name: Skilled
options.description:
Skilled|w=30
:* You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

grants.name: Skilled
grants.description: You gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

options.name: Spell Sniper
options.description:
Spell Sniper|w=30
:* You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.
:* Notes:
:** The cantrip you learn must be one of these:
:*** Bone Chill
:*** Eldritch Blast
:*** Fire Bolt
:*** Ray of Frost
:*** Shocking Grasp
:*** Thorn Whip
:** These cantrips do scale with character level, just like a spellcaster's cantrips.

grants.name: Spell Sniper
grants.description:
You learn a cantrip, and the number you need to roll a Spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

The cantrip must be one of:
* Bone Chill
* Eldritch Blast
* Fire Bolt
* Ray of Frost
* Shocking Grasp
* Thorn Whip

options.name: Tavern Brawler

Tavern Brawler|w=30

:* When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your strength modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

grants.name: Tavern Brawler
grants.description:
Increase your Strength or Constitution by 1, to a maximum of 20.

When you make an unarmed attack, use an improvised weapon, or throw something, your Strength Modifier is added twice to the damage and Attack Rolls.Bug

options.name: Tough

Tough|w=30

grants.name: Tough
grants.description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained.

options.name: War Caster
options.description:
War Caster: Concentration|w=30
:* You gain Advantage on SavingThrows to maintain Concentration on a Spell.

War Caster: Opportunity Spell|w=30
:* You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.
:* Note: this feat does not grant the cantrip Shocking Grasp. Unless you know it from another source, you can only  cast it as an Attack of Opportunity.

grants.name: War Caster: Concentration

grants.name: War Caster: Opportunity Spell
grants.description: You can also use a Reaction to cast Shocking Grasp at a target moving out of melee range.

Weapon Master|w=30
:* Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.

grants.name: Weapon Master
grants.description:
Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Gain Proficiency with four Weapon types of your choice.

options.name: Abjuration School
options.description: Abjuration spells summon wards, banish enemies, and nullify magic, suitable for those who wish to defend themselves and others.

grants.name: Improved Abjuration
grants.description: Each time you take a Short Rest, the intensity of your Arcane Ward increases by an amount equal to your wizard level.

options.name: Conjuration School
options.description: Compelled by shape and motion, your favoured arcane style involves summoning creatures and objects, as well as displacing them in space.

grants.name: Focused Conjuration
grants.description: Damage taken while you are Concentrating on a Conjuration spell will not break your Concentration.

options.name: Divination School
options.description: You peer through time itself and can sculpt the future, like temporal clay, into a more favourable form.

grants.name: Third Eye: Darkvision
grants.description: You gain the ability to see in the dark out to a range of m=27|ft=80

grants.name: Third Eye: See Invisibility
grants.description: Become able to see Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.

options.name: Enchantment School
options.description: Your magic influences, beguiles, and bends the will and conviction of those around you.

grants.name: Split Enchantment
grants.description: You know your enchantments inside and out. You can target 2 creatures with Enchantment spells that would normally only target 1 creature.

options.name: Evocation School
options.description: Evocation spells focus elemental energy into powerful attacks and enchantments. Those who specialise in this school are known as evokers.

grants.name: Empowered Evocation
grants.description: Your grasp of Evocation magic has tightened, and you can add your Intelligence Modifier to damage rolls with any Evocation spells.

options.name: Illusion School
options.description: You specialise in unravelling and restitching the fabric of reality to fool the unwary, the gullible, and the monstrous.

grants.name: Illusory Self
grants.description:
Interpose an illusory duplicate of yourself between you and an attacker's strike, making them miss their attack. 

You must Short Rest to use this feature again.

options.name: Necromancy School
options.description: You walk through the valley of the shadow of death, and make lots of friends there.

grants.name: Inured to Undeath
grants.description: You have steeped yourself so completely in death that you are hit point maximum cannot be reduced.

options.name: Transmutation School
options.description: Your innate fascination with the structure of things has granted you an incredible power over crude matter and its manipulation.

grants.name: Shapechanger
grants.description:
Transform into a blue jay, able to Fly (Class Action)|Fly. 

If the blue jay's hit points drop to 0, the target reverts to its original form with its original hit points.

options.name: Ability Improvement
options.description:
Note: While technically not a Feat, Ability Improvement is offered within the Feat Selection menu.
* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

grants.name: Ability Improvement
grants.description:

* Increase one Ability Score by 2, or two Ability Scores by 1.
* You can't increase an Ability Score above 20 using this feature.

options.name: Actor

* Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance checks. 
* Note: despite not mentioning this in the tooltip, the character also gains proficiency in these 2 skills if they didn't have those proficiencies yet (game version: 4.36.34458).

options.name: Charger
options.description:
Gain the following weapon attacks:

Charger: Weapon Attack|w=30
:* Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
:* Notes:
:** Use both an action and bonus action, move up to 9m, and make a melee attack with +5 damage.
:** This counts as a single weapon attack, not a full Action, so it is possible to follow up with abilities like Extra Attack.

Charger: Shove|w=30
:* Charge forward and Shove the first enemy in your way.
:* Notes:
:** Shove distance depends on your Strength and the target's weight.
:** This counts as a full Action.

options.name: Dual Wielder

Dual Wielder|w=30
:* You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if your weapons aren't Light You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

grants.description: You have a +1 bonus to ArmourClass while wielding a melee weapon in each hand.

grants.description: You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if the weapons you are wielding aren't Light. You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

grants.name: Dungeon Delver: Resist Traps

options.name: Elemental Adept
options.description:
* Spells you cast ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. In addition, when you deal that type of damage with a Spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Damage resistance options are one of the following:
* Elemental Adept: Acid
* Elemental Adept: Cold
* Elemental Adept: Lightning
* Elemental Adept: Fire
* Elemental Adept: Thunder

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Acid
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Acid damage. In addition, when you deal Acid damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Cold
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Cold damage. In addition, when you deal Cold damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Lightning
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Lightning damage. In addition, when you deal Lightning damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Fire
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Fire damage. In addition, when you deal Fire damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

grants.name: Elemental Adept: Thunder
grants.description: Spells you cast ignore Resistance to Thunder damage. In addition, when you deal Thunder damage with a spell, you cannot roll a 1.

Great Weapon Master: All In|w=30

:* Note: This is a toggleable passive ability.

grants.name: Great Weapon Master: Bonus Attack
